Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Officer err in concluding that the marriage was entered into primarily for immigration purposes?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer found inconsistencies in financial and social evidence, questioned marriage timing
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine or entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Questionable marriage timing and inconsistent documentation
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Factor: Timing of marriage, credibility of relationship, immigration history
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspicion of immigration fraud due to sham marriage indicators
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in financial and social evidence, discrepancies in documentation
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Misrepresentation in border or immigration documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubts about authenticity of marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged Officer’s conclusion in judicial review
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Officer err in concluding that the marriage was entered into primarily for immigration purposes?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned financial and social affairs, timing of marriage, immigration history
Evidence_Type: Nigerian passport application without spouse's knowledge
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine or entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to disclose prior visa refusal and secretive passport application
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to declare previous visa refusal
Crimes.Application_Factor: Non-disclosure of prior refusal, credibility of spousal relationship
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspicion of sham marriage and non-disclosure of material facts
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to disclose previous refusal, lack of transparency with spouse
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of openness with spouse, concealment of immigration actions
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant filed judicial review challenging Officer’s decision
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to declare previous immigration refusal

Crimes.Crime_Name: Using a passport that did not belong to him
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Officer err in concluding that the marriage was entered into primarily for immigration purposes?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned marriage timing post-refusal, financial/social inconsistencies, fraudulent documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine or entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of someone else’s passport and history of fraudulent documentation
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Factor: Entry using false identity, subsequent marriage-based application
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Use of fraudulent passport and suspicion of marriage fraud
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Possession and use of fraudulent travel document, inconsistencies in personal history
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Dishonesty in entry method and immigration history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged Officer’s decision via judicial review
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation and use of fraudulent document under IRPA
